Title: If I Started a Instagram Account in 2024, I'd Do This

Content.Text: The first crucial thing to understand is the Instagram algorithm, which prioritizes keeping users on the platform for as long as possible to maximize ad revenue. This means creating content that stimulates viewers and maintains their attention.

To create viral content, focus on the idea, hook, and value. Start with a good idea to avoid wasting time and effort on videos that won't perform well. The hook is essential to grab viewers' attention, and the value should be maintained throughout your content to retain viewers and gain followers.

Learn to film high-quality cinematic visuals and edit efficiently to separate yourself from the competition and improve video quality. Cinematic videos tend to perform well on Instagram. Editing on a computer is more efficient and creative than using the Instagram app.

While Instagram no longer pays creators directly, you can monetize your content through sponsorships, collaborations, and other means. Building a successful Instagram account requires a strategy and process to improve efficiency in various aspects.
